title: Who is more popular: Emiway Bantai, Divine or Raftaar? Whom would you like to watch perform live? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here Is The List Of, Top 10 Indian Famous Hip Hop Rappers: [math](I am not including Honey Singh Or Badshah, because they are not into underground scene)[/math]  Raftaar:— Raftaar, whose real name is Dilin Nair; started his career way back in 2006. He was the reason behind lifting up Indian underground scene. He currently is the most famous Indian Rapper, who even brought real content in Bollywood, with his song “Mantoniyat". Suggested Song:-   Ikka:— Ikka's name in list is must, as spoken word “Supne", with MTV; made him notice more in the underground scene, he has been there since Badshah, Honey Singh And Raftaar.Suggested Song:-   Emiway Bantai:—Emiway, whose real name is Shahrukh/Bilal Sheikh, started his career in 2013. He is an experimental rapper, but since the song #Sadak, He has been promoting culture. The 2018 (Raftaar-Emiway Beef) made Emiway talk of the town. His recent release which was a tribute to Eminem was also a masterpiece refix. He has gained 80 Million + views only on the beef scene with Raftaar, that too on YouTube only.Suggested Song:-   Divine:—Vivian Fernandes Divine, started his career in 2013, his song “ Ye Mera Bombay “ made him a little renowned in Indian underground Hip Hop Scene. His first single with Sony Music India, “Jungli Sher", was released in 2015.Suggested Song:-   Pardhaan:—The pre-poster boy of Rap Crew (Desi Beam), is a known individual rapper now and Bohemia's favourite Indian Rapper. He has his works named to every big label:— Kali Denali Music, T-Series, Desi Music Factory etc.Suggested Song:-   Suggested Song:- Naezy:—Naved Sheikh from Mumbai is a rapper, who started his journey with songs such as, Aafat. Naved is so promising, That it was him, which inspired, Film Director Zoya Akhtar To Produce “Gully Boy". He has also sung a track “Birju”, in Bollywood film “Hey Bro”.Suggested Song:-   Muhfaad: Gaurav or Muhfaad is a budding artist from Delhi, who has made it promising with his beautiful, lyrics and compositions, Muhfaad is an artist or probably only from Delhi, who got music videos done with Bilal Saeed (Hookah Hookah) and Raftaar (Sare Karo Dab) which has gained him a mass popularity.Suggested Song:-   MC Stan: MC Stan, who rephrase hip hop from Pune City has been there for a while but got attention after he dissed Emiway and Divine. He has been talk of the town ever since that, his popularity and intrest has grown.Suggested Song:-   Raga: Raga is an under-rated artist from the future label: Artisttan, Raga came into limelight with his single “Jamnapaar", which went viral, he is my favourite artist from this list, and he ofcourse deserves more.Suggested Song:-   Harjas: Harjas is a flavoured rapper who knows how pour taste to ears. He is also a bi-product of artisttan but now he is signed with AK Projects. This Delhi boy will keep you high for a while .Suggested Song:-

Considering recent scenario emiway bantai has won the the battle of popular rap artist because of his rapping style, voice, slang,looks,lyrics,music everything he did in the last few months is outstanding and he gained more than 2.6millon follower's on YouTube and has good number of follower's on social Media platforms, but if we talk about the big names like raftaar and Divine are the most popular artists in the Bollywood industry as they are commercial music artists and they have music labels of big music companies like T-series,sonymusic and more as they are working from so long they are the true players of this rap game,talking about emiway he is working very hard to prove himself as best rap artist of the country, he is so talented that he can become no one Indian rap artist one day as he did a lot of work, few months back he bought his own studio and has his own production team, he said few months back he is a complete independent artist of our India and I think it's true music lover.
